class.name: Account
class.description: This class is used to interact with a Starknet account. It allows you to execute transactions, query account information, and manage account state. It is a fundamental part of interacting with the Starknet network.

method.name: create
method.description: Initializes the account with the given RPC URL, address, and private key.

method.name: deploy_burner
method.description: Deploys a new burner account using a master account to pay for the deployment fees. The [code]signing_key[/code] is the private key for the new burner account. The result is emitted via the [signal transaction_executed] or [signal transaction_failed] signal.

method.name: execute_raw
method.description: Executes a raw transaction. [code]to[/code] is the contract address, [code]selector[/code] is the function selector, and [code]calldata[/code] is an array of arguments for the function. The result is emitted via the [signal transaction_executed] or [signal transaction_failed] signal.

method.name: get_address
method.description: Returns the address of the account.

method.name: get_chain_id
method.description: Returns the chain ID of the network. If [code]parse[/code] is [code]true[/code], it returns the parsed chain ID.

method.name: get_nonce
method.description: Returns the current nonce of the account.

method.name: is_account_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the account is valid and ready to be used, [code]false[/code] otherwise.

method.name: set_block_id
method.description: Sets the block ID to be used for transactions. If empty, it defaults to the latest block.

method.name: start_provider
method.description: Starts the JSON-RPC provider for the account.

signal.name: transaction_executed
signal.description: Emitted when a transaction is successfully executed. The [code]success_message[/code] contains the transaction receipt.

signal.name: transaction_failed
signal.description: Emitted when a transaction fails. The [code]error_message[/code] contains details about the error.
